deity.name: Bahamut
deity.title: The Platinum Dragon
deity.text: Bahamut is the god of justice, protection, nobility, and honor. Lawful good paladins often revere him, and metallic dragons worship him as the first of their kind. Monarchs are crowned in his name. He commands his followers thus:
► Uphold the highest ideals of honor and justice.
► Be constantly vigilant against evil and oppose it on all fronts.
► Protect the weak, liberate the oppressed, and defend just order.

power.title: Armor of Bahamut
power.fluff: Bahamut protects you or a friend from devastating harm

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy scores a critical hit against you or an ally within range

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The critical hit becomes a normal hit.
